intro.mainDescription: We believe Wellness is not a destination, it is a journey. We promise to be by your side as your Wellness Companion.

screen_1.heading: Personalized Plans
screen_1.description: Work on your Mental Wellness by making simple, personalized Wellness plans

screen_2.heading: Trusted Community
screen_2.description: Be a part of a safe, trusted, global community to find the help you need and help others

OTP.otpMessage: Please enter the 6 digit code sent to your email
OTP.otpSent: Code successfully sent to your email.Please check your spam in case you do not find it in your inbox.

forgotPassword.forgotPassMessage: Please enter the email you used to sign up. We will send you a verification code to reset your password.
forgotPassword.enterOtpMessage: Please enter the 6 digit code sent to your email

resetPassword.resetMessage: Set the new password for your account so you can login and access all the features.

welcome.message1: You have taken the hardest step towards your Wellness already!
welcome.message2: We would like to know you better so we can help you create a personalized experience most suitable for your Wellness journey

diary.diaryFirstPageInfo: Penning down your thoughts can bring structure to your inner world of fragmented emotions. You can gain great insights into yourself here your strengths, weakness, ambitions, obstacles and thoughts that go on in your heart and mind. Writing your diary every day is a step towards personal growth and development. What you write will be personal and confidential and only you can view it.
diary.writeText: Feel free to write anything that has been on your mind

wellness.firstMessage: This preliminary assessment is only to find a starting point for your wellness journey. There are no right or wrong answers. Please feel free to select the most suitable options. Based on your inputs, we will determine an initial wellness score which you can adjust if you like. Ultimately, the goal is to help you make a plan that works best for you, and therefore Your assessment of your wellness is what matters.
wellness.firstMessage1: This is not a standardized test and your scores will remain confidential.
wellness.message: Based on your answers we have determined the starting point of your wellness journey. If you feel the score is not accurate, you may adjust your responses to each aspect by clicking on them below. Your scores will change as you work on your wellness plans.
wellness.doYou: Do you wish to build your wellness plan?

settings.message1: We are here to help you! You may find your answer in the
settings.message2: , if not, just type your message below and we shall get in touch with you at the earliest.
settings.submitMessage: Thank you for writing to us. Someone from our team will get in touch with you shortly!
settings.successMessage: Thank you for writing to us. Someone from our team will get in touch with you via email.
settings.signOutMessage: Are you sure you want to sign out?

community.initialMessage1: This community has been created to help you find a safe, trusted place and peer support from other people around the world who are going through similar experiences as you.
community.initialMessage2: We care for you and we are here to help you build a trusted network with people who will encourage you and support you in overcoming challenges in your life.
community.initialMessage3: Sharing helps you in more ways than you may think. Please feel free to share, chat, express, comment, connect, motivate and support others, too.
community.beforeYouEnter: Before you enter, please see the community rules and guidelines.
community.kind2: Let everything you say be good and helpful
community.spam2: It's a trusted place to share, not a marketplace
community.info2: Protect your identity and not share any social links
community.abusive1: Don't Use Foul Or Abusive Language
community.abusive2: Your words are meant to encourage others, not hurt them
community.support2: Help each other find a sense of purpose and belonging
community.iUnderstand: I understand and agree to abide by these rules.
community.feelFree: Feel free to share your thoughts and feelings here
community.tellUs: Please tell us why you want to report this post.

errorMessage.passwordMinium: Password must be at least 8 characters long
errorMessage.newPasswordMinium: New password must be at least 8 characters long
errorMessage.confirmPasswordMinium: Confirm password must be at least 8 characters long
errorMessage.passwordMatch: New password and confirm password should be same
errorMessage.passwordMax: Password must be in between 8-20 characters
errorMessage.passwordSpecialCharacter: Password must have a special character
errorMessage.passwordUpperCaseLetter: Password must have a capital letter
errorMessage.passwordLowerCaseLetter: Password must have a small letter
errorMessage.firstNameRequiredMin: First name must be in between 3-15 characters
errorMessage.lastNameRequiredMin: Last name must be in between 3-15 characters
errorMessage.max2Cleaner: Minimum 1 and maximum 2 cleaners can be selected
errorMessage.cleanerNotAvailable: Cleaner not available on this date
errorMessage.placeNotAvailable: Place not available on this date
